message: A fair 60-40 split, let's be reasonable!
I'm willing to give you 40% of the money, but I need to get a better deal for myself. It's only fair, considering inflation will eat away at my share in the next round.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than before. Take it before it's too late!
